gear_tradeoffs.pros: Boosts accuracy and speed for debuffs.

a1.name: Burning Fist
a1.notes: Attacks 1 enemy. 30% chance of placing HP Burn debuff for 2 turns.

a2.name: Creeping Petrify
a2.notes: Attacks 1 enemy. Transfers all debuffs from Geomancer to the target, then attacks. Reduces target's Turn Meter by 100% if under HP Burn.

a3.name: Quicksand Grasp
a3.notes: Places a 25% Weaken and HP Burn debuff on all enemies for 3 turns. Passive: Whenever an enemy under HP Burn attacks an ally, reflects a portion of the damage and reduces their Turn Meter.

passive.name: Stoneguard
passive.description: Reflects damage and reduces Turn Meter of enemies under HP Burn when they attack allies.

booking.notes: Books reduce cooldowns and increase debuff chance.

scenarios.notes: Warmaster procs on HP Burn reflect and direct hits.
High value due to frequent HP Burn triggers.

clan_boss.notes: HP Burn reflect and debuffs provide high damage and utility.

synergy.relentless_viability: Not recommended; Perception or Lifesteal preferred.

investment.notes: Geomancer is one of the best Epic HP Burners for Clan Boss and Hydra.

owned_comparison.comparison: Geomancer provides more utility and higher damage.

draft_logic.notes: Excellent pick for HP Burn and Turn Meter control.

gear_set_stability.Savage: Not relevant for HP Burn role.

utility_comparison.comparison: Geomancer is superior for Clan Boss and Hydra.

final_summary.booking_impact: High; books increase damage and debuff uptime.
final_summary.damage_rotation: A3 > A2 > A1, maintain HP Burn and Weaken debuffs.
final_summary.passive_impact: Reflects damage and reduces enemy Turn Meter.
final_summary.ally_synergy_impact: Works best with revivers and Increase DEF buffers.
final_summary.draft_value: Excellent for Clan Boss and Hydra.

team_setups.name: Clan Boss HP Burn
team_setups.strategy: Maintain HP Burn and Weaken, use Increase DEF and Block Debuffs.

similar_champions.similarity_reason: HP Burn specialist, but less utility.

llmAnalysis.summary: Geomancer is a top-tier Epic for HP Burn and Turn Meter control, excelling in Clan Boss and Hydra. His passive reflects damage and reduces enemy Turn Meter, making him invaluable for boss fights.
llmAnalysis.synergy: Best paired with Increase DEF and Block Debuffs buffers, and revivers like Duchess Lilitu.
